text: Ðis sindon ða landgemæro ærest on ðane blacan pyt of ðan pytte<../images/tbar.gif>upon<../images/tbar.gif>eaþland eal swa ðe oxa went<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeþ on ðone mær hege to graftune<../images/tbar.gif>in<../images/tbar.gif>æscbed of ðæm æscbedde<../images/tbar.gif>on ðrim gerum ðanane on ðone holan weg of ðan wege to ðæs bisceopes wuda<../images/tbar.gif>in dic weg.
Of ðam wege in ðone lytlan graf ðonene in ða ealdan dic.
Ðanene on ða portstræt of ðan wege in mærford of ðan forda in hnutfen.
Of ðan fenne in eald cotan<../images/tbar.gif>to graf hrygce.
Of ðan hrygce in ðane wic weg of ðan wege on uffan lege.

Of ðære lege on lytlan broc ðanene on hymelbroc andlang broces<../images/tbar.gif>op of ðan broce in Egcbyrhttigc croft<../images/tbar.gif>upward be ðan croft in ða stræt æt ipwæl hylle æfter stræte in hennuc ðanene in rugan mædewan of rugen mædewan<../images/tbar.gif>eft on ðone blacan pyt.
